Posted By: Lord_FarkwadtehThird (10/3/2011 7:48:25 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: @ Falyxron, I must respectfully disagree. The best black can do on turn one is [dark ritual](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=dark ritual), [thoughtsieze](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=thoughtsieze), [entomb](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=entomb) and finally [reanimate](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=reanimate). You get the biggest, scariest creature you can find and they lose a card in their hand that [duress](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=duress) might not have even been able to grab. You could actually use multiple dark rituals for some real shenanigans if you're feeling particularly devilish.
posts.html:
@ Falyxron, I must respectfully disagree. The best black can do on turn one is dark ritual, thoughtsieze, entomb and finally reanimate.
